data.feedback: Comprehensive plan covering all 7 user requirements with excellent architecture. All referenced files verified to exist. Backend API integration properly mapped. Minor issues are non-blocking (duplicate dependencies).
issues: Minor: Duplicate dependencies in epic-native-integration and epic-realtime-client
Note: Frontend api_endpoints.dart has logout/forgot-password not in backend (future enhancement)
suggestions: Remove duplicate dependency entries for cleaner execution
Consider adding backend epic for forgot-password if needed
